text: rju margaya meya yayi tamanta pæhædili vuvayin pasuvada kavurun (allahge) mema dutayava athæra dama ven vi visvasavantayingen novana margayehi gaman karanneda, ohuva api ohu gaman karana (væradi) margayehima yannata ida di, (pasuva) ohuva nirayehi sendu kara harinnemu. eya yana sthanayangen itamat narakaya
